The only reason I am commenting is because I finally figured out why Dr. Cox was bald. Although we probably all realized it at the same time this week Dr. Cox is bald because he has Raynaud's syndrome. If you look carefully every time he is disgusted, annoyed, or stressed you can see his finger tips go white. His hands fall under his cold extremities part of the disease. If you google Raynaud disease cold hands and blue fingers cold finger

The Bone Snatcher is about a group miners who go on a search for a missing crew of miners in the Namib Desert. Michael Dudikoff stars as Joe Armstrong a martial artist who fights ninjas who are stealing weapons from the U.S Army, in this entertaining yet admittedly brainless comedic action film.
